title: Ethnic minority customers of the Pensions, Disability and Carers Service: an evidence review.
abstract:
The aim of this project was to review and synthesise available evidence that could\ud
throw light on: why Black and Minority Ethnic (BME) customers are less satisfied\ud
with the Pension, Disability and Carers Service (PDCS); why BME individuals eligible\ud
for the PDCS benefits are less likely to apply for them; what interventions might\ud
be successful at raising levels of take-up and satisfaction with PDCS services; and\ud
what important gaps exist in research evidence to answer these questions
